Computer.name: DEC Internal Workstation Steve
Computer.file: Joan: I got some juicy stuff this time round. Steve: Being? Joan: You know John? Joan: He has gone one step further, and is handing out his workstation password. Joan: Just in the middle of the corridoor: "just use my PC. admin soccerstud." Steve: You sure you're fine handing out his password though? Joan: Tough. I'm sure half the building knows it already.
